website_summaries.verdict: This ladder is durable and comes in 3 lengths to suit any activity.
pros: Flat plastic rungs that are fully adjustable
Won't break or wear out over time
cons: No stakes included to prevent the ladder from moving around when laid on the ground

customer_reviews.title: Brittle plastic breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Tried to save some money for our team by buying these vs. the name brand product. What a mistake. These are made with VERY brittle plastic and two rungs snapped in half the first time a player stepped on them. We have the name brand agility ladder and it hasn't had any problems for 6 years! Additionally, there isn't any loops in the nylon webbing to secure the ladders with stakes. So you'll have to get creative if you want these to stay in place. I would not recommend anyone buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: NMChknHwk

customer_reviews.title: Agility, yes. Speed not necessary.
customer_reviews.text: My Physical Therapist had one, so after we were done I bought this to use at home. At 75, I don't use it for speed, but I find it helpful with my balance issues. I looked up the many videos available, and I mimic them, only slower.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda G W North

customer_reviews.title: Do you think your coordinated?
customer_reviews.text: Yes4All has never let me down and this agility ladder is no exception! A great addition to my fitness routine, this ladder is sturdy, a great size and I love that it comes with a carrying bag so I can pack it up and torture my friends on the go.
customer_reviews.author: currenakat

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight...I can take it to the park or local field.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the "Yes4All Speed Agility Ladder with Carry Bag – Multi Choice: 8, 12, 20 Rung". It comes with a simple carrying case which helps it from getting all tangled. I ordered the 12 rung and honestly it's perfect for my little garage gym. It goes from one side of my garage to the other and I just go back and forth however many times I have set up for the day with my other circut stations. Very lightweight...I've taken it with me to the beach and park as well. Works pretty darn well in the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Trish Graham

customer_reviews.title: This is almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to duplicate items I'm using in PT as my sessions come to an end. I like this particular agility ladder because it's longer than the one I'm using. But, the 'rungs' do not lay flat to the floor like the ladder I'm currently using in PT. That poses a bit of a problem now, because I am trying to correct an issue that makes one of my feet 'drag'. These rungs are about a 1/4" thick and I am more apt to 'drag' across a rung and move the entire ladder in doing so. Hopefully with more work this won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wyckette

customer_reviews.title: Great Ladder for Training
customer_reviews.text: The 12 is the perfect size. the 8 is good but a touch too small and the 20, I don't have it but that would be good for 1 person going then when next person is part of the way done they go otherwise too large. Durable and folds easy
customer_reviews.author: The Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to any home workout!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome agility ladder for the price. Yes, it moves a heck of a lot, but that'll certainly make you more agile! :D Honestly I was pretty frustrated with it at first, but once I got the hang of not touching it (which you aren't supposed to do, anyway), it worked like a charm. I got this for Insanity Asylum and it gets the job done, quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: GirlieM

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent for the price, but QC on the snaps needed
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of being able to adjust the rungs, that they had the color blue, they came with a velcro strap & carry sack ... one of the main reasons I made the purchase of (3) sets was because they can be snapped together; however, one of the three sets arrived with a snap missing (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: BAqua

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to a home gym
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boys who are in football to work on the quickness of their footwork. Additionally, it is just a nice addition to our home gym space. It is super easy to put together, or take apart and store. We tend to just roll ours up into a bundle instead of taking each rung off when we want to store it. It is super lightweight and could be packed around as workout gear if traveling. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Loose rungs make for added work
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these to use for soccer training with high schoolers. They're easy to fold and lay out, but the rungs are rather loose on the straps. So if you were to snag one with your foot, the individual rung will slide out of place just as much as the whole ladder moves. Also means that every time you lay them out you have spend several minutes getting each box equal and squared out. They dont seem like they're 100% awful and maybe the rungs will get firmer on yhe straps with use. But for right now, I'll use these as backups only and use the old ones as primaries.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: The agility cones are subpar. The agility ladder is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The agility ladder is great, works and looks awesome. However, the agility cones are cheap, soft and unusable. They're flimsy and can’t stay up, they fly away and move easily.
customer_reviews.author: King Kong

customer_reviews.title: Cat like reflexes incoming now that I have this bad boy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid agility ladder. Easy to setup and put away. Has a little bag to make storage pretty easy. Doesn't have a lot of weight to it, so like other agility ladders moves pretty easily when tapped. Which is a good thing to show that I'm not being as agile and precise as I should be.
customer_reviews.author: J Tee

customer_reviews.title: Train at Home
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for this after using agility ladders at a few sports clinics. The ladder rolls out of the handy storage bag, is durable and stores easily. Great value for adding a little something extra to home workouts. We also found lots of videos online for alternate workouts using the agility ladder.
customer_reviews.author: MommyIves

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Agility - Knee Surgery Rehab
customer_reviews.text: I had an ACL injury and recovering from it. I had my surgery few months back and now I am at the stage to improve agility. I am using this ladder on the grass, Below are my observations - Weight less - Not slippery even though you step on the ladder sticks - Adjustable ladder sticks - Packing & unpacking very easy - I would have given 5* if the cones are little bit more quality I would say go for it!!
customer_reviews.author: Venni

customer_reviews.title: The nylon straps are too thin, which causes the steps to shift after any movement
customer_reviews.text: The black nylon straps that pass through the rungs is way too thin. Every time you unravel the rope ladder or shift it while you're working out, you have to readjust the distances between rungs. I don't know if this a recent design change, but I really can't believe this product has such high reviews when it's a nuisance to work out. You would have better luck removing the nylon strap from the rungs and placing them individually on the ground. I plan on returning my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bacon, mmmm

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick conditioning drills
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is just what our home gym needed. Perfect for quick conditioning drills. Easy to fold up and doesn’t take up any space. Easy to throw in a gym bag and take wherever you go!
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Lyda-Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Overall about as good as you can expect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The parts are a bit flimsy, but it sets up easily and stays in place. I use it for 7 to 11 yo boys playing baseball. But when coaches stomp all over it it still holds up. The velcro is not much help and the bag is a waste of time. It did not come with ground steaks to hold it in place. But for the money it is fine, and better & larger than others at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R

customer_reviews.title: Useful and durable
customer_reviews.text: It is useful, I use it everyday with my sons. I think it is durable even though We only used it indoors because of the covid, I cannot comment on outdoor use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pp US Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Effective; A Great Product Worthy of Your Money.
customer_reviews.text: These bands are great for the price. They are very durable and work just as well as other ladders, ladders that are usually much, much more expensive , but cost the same amount of money to make. I would recommend these bands to anyone looking to increase their foot speed, agility, or foot coordination. Also if they do ever break, they weren't very expensive so you don't have to worry as much as you would if you owned another ladder and it broke.
customer_reviews.author: iay dude

customer_reviews.title: Great for simple workout.
customer_reviews.text: This is A great agility ladder for one child. The only complaint I have is the ladder is not that durable and probably won’t hold up with consistent use. But it is a good first time purchase to see if your child will remain consistent with workouts before a parent pays a lot of money for a more expensive agility ladder.
customer_reviews.author: ann evans

customer_reviews.title: simple and quick easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use until its kicked, lol. But quick fix, just slide the pieces where you want them and its. Back to where you want it. So it is completely adjustable for ladder sized, my kids love it, its easy to carry in the bag and store as well. Seems durable so far. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tavalos27

customer_reviews.title: Twisted piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing came to me with twists in the middle of the nylon straps that there's NO way to take out. I can't flip the straps in the ladder rungs, because there's not enough room in the slots. And I can't take the straps out and re-thread them because there are snaps grommetted into both ends of each strap. So is my "agility" supposed to come from jumping over all the knots you've twisted into this piece of junk? I wish I didn't have to give you one star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for team workouts
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our softball team. At first they did not like the drills but now they ask for them to be done at every practice. Their foot work is becoming so much better with the drills that we have them do.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: I hate that every time a foot hit the yellow ladder rungs, the rung slides down the nylon sides. Rather than pulling the ladder straight, you have the readjust the rung to the proper spacing and then pull the whole ladder straight again... so frustrating! I am returning this ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t overpay for agility ladders
customer_reviews.text: I own a boxing club and now have 12 sets of these ladders. They’re no different than any other ladder on the market but a fraction of the price. If you’re looking to grab some footwork ladders for your home or gym, do yourself a favor and pick these up cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nolan

customer_reviews.title: took kid from worst to first on speed and agility
customer_reviews.text: Great to improve speed and agility. My son uses these three or four days per week and has gone from “worst to first” (or second or third) on the team for speed and Agility and coordination. A hard step or an accidental trip on one of the rings with cleats on can cause them to break.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This is inexpensive yes but not very useful. The rungs are made of very cheap brittle plastic. But the worst part?! The rungs move with the slightest touch! Very frustrating when doing agility. If your foot touches any part of the ladder the rungs slide around.
customer_reviews.author: vballBlake

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to help keep his workouts varied. He says " It does pretty good, it holds up well, it got a 4 star for easy to fold because of operator error, i got the cords tangled up. " Coming from a 16 yr old boy, i think he covered it :)
customer_reviews.author: sue cleek

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is delivered just as advertised. I have used it many times at soccer practice to train foot work. The rung quality is decent but the whole thing in general is a little weak. It would be nice if it came with some kind of hook which could be mounted to the ground so that the ladder doesn't move if someone skims the rung while running through. The good part is it is very easy to pack and unpack and comes with a small travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer dude

customer_reviews.title: I use it one kids for football and basketball ages raging from 7 to 12 the seem to like it. Just a little hasel pick the up ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable serves its purpose. I use it one kids for football and basketball ages raging from 7 to 12 the seem to like it.Just a little hasel pick the up and storing them in the bag. Most take you time on doing if not not the latter will tangle up.
customer_reviews.author: Fermin Torres

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kid's Soccer practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it with one 12 Rung agility ladder, 12 yellow cones and a carry bag. It was a good deal and has everything for a kid soccer training. The cones are made with very thin plastic, but still stay at the position ok. For the price of ~18$, I like to give it 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: family father

customer_reviews.title: At home, for park, for training
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase. My son was using these ladders for soccer training and when sheltering was put in place, it was a bummer he couldn’t continue training. These were perfect and on top of that, I was able to use for myself for exercise drills.
customer_reviews.author: vic781123

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: The agility ladder came all tangled and it's impossible to untangled it, as I have tried it. I felt like returning it but it cost only $10. Also the space between the plates not big enough for a person with big feet to step in. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia G. Amaral

customer_reviews.title: Usable ladders, but difficult to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these agility ladders for use with kids sports. We train indoor so there is no good way to stake them down. If someone gets tripped up and moves the ladder, we have to stop and stretch them back out. Other than that, they seem to be sturdy and do what they need to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: OK ladder for footwork
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this ladder for children's agility exercises, mainly to improve their fencing footwork. It is a good ladder and the structure is sturdy. However, I hope the material used can be heavier to avoid moving during the use.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: OK agility ladder
customer_reviews.text: This ladder is just OK. Was looking for an agility ladder for my son but didn't want to pay too much. It does get a tangled a bit so you need to be very careful when laying it out and putting it away.
customer_reviews.author: justell03

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This ladder serves its purpose for drills in practices. It did come apart a couple times after the team had gone through half of a season but was easily fixed. Not really broken just not as tightly together and as easy to put in it’s carrying sack. I will need a few ladders in the future and will buy these they serve its purpose and don’t cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: For anyone who wants to exercise
customer_reviews.text: Great for indoor or outside. Easy to put way and easy to carry. Size is ok for any ages. My kids love playing with and they do not trip over. Recommend for any age
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Keila Coimbra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Perfect for extra cardio
customer_reviews.text: Great little extra for exercise. It fits in our living room perfectly my husband myself and my kids all use it. No complaints. Easy to fold up and put away an easy to lay out. We've used it for a couple of months with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have several speed ladders and this while inexpensive actually works quite well. The rungs are solid plastic strips that can be slid back and forth with a little effort to space it back out after a misstep. The bag is decent too, its just a little tight fitting it in the bag. For the money, tough to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter often needs a ladder for her soccer training programs and this got me looking for a reasonably priced one. We bought the 12-rung. She has already used it several times and she is very happy with it. Given the price, I was a bit concerned about sturdiness, but I am happy to report that it is excellent. The ladder is easy to set up and remains stable even with my daughter's most high-intensity exercises -- as stable as any high-quality ladder I have ever seen. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for My Son
customer_reviews.text: Standard agility ladder. Perfect for my sons who play soccer and wrestle. If you’re conditioning or have kids who do, buy an agility ladder and use it. So many different exercises and great for building quick twitch response and footwork.
customer_reviews.author: AlfaCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Had Better
customer_reviews.text: Had to go 3 stars. I always thought that a ladder was a ladder, but I've had another ladder and it was the bee's knees. This one was no part of the bee. I wanted to return it, but the hassle of sending it back was ... you know how it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty easily breakable but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as the price was the least. The problem was 2 of them where broken. Not completely but still broken. We can still use it for excersises by sticking them so I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: sankarsh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for coaches
customer_reviews.text: Very good ladder. Typical construction that you would get at a sports store. This is a VERY long one. Longest I've seen which is great because I normally have to buy two and attach them. Works great and lays flat on most surfaces, longer grass tends to trip up my 14 yr olds, but after a few rounds the ground is more manageable. The case is functional, a little on the flimsy side, but fine since they throw that into the price.
customer_reviews.author: ChavieWife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to increase foot speed. I use it with my 10 year olds for flag football and my 12 year old is working on foot speed for soccer. The product seems to be durable and comes with a great little storage case.
customer_reviews.author: tdell

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to basketball practice
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our girl’s basketball practices. We start every practice with agility drills on the ladder combined with dribbling drills. I’ve really seen great development in their quickness.
customer_reviews.author: icanthruchrist

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again....but.....
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is the rungs slide/move so they need to be readjusted often. Based on cost figured this would be an issue....would buy again but need to find a way to set the rungs in permanent position.
customer_reviews.author: JLW

customer_reviews.title: Great agility ladder for indoors or out
customer_reviews.text: The durable material that this is made from makes it excellent for usage both indoors and out. The agility ladder is lightweight and folds up easily for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Black

customer_reviews.title: Nice agility ladder for lacrosse
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons for working on their footwork for lacrosse. Built pretty well and YouTube has been excellent as far as learning drills for their development from easy to harder.
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: This is super hard to untangle. It kept twisting and I almost rolled my ankle a few times. I’ve since stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Y.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 15 year old son who is training to be a boxer and it is absolutely perfect for what he needs. Durable material.
customer_reviews.author: C & S AUTO

customer_reviews.title: Soccer
customer_reviews.text: Got this for soccer hoping to make my daughter have quicker feet. It would probably work perfectly however we always end up just running around and having fun rather than Drilling
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for little Big jumpers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Like the storage bag. Light weight but stays in place during workout. Fun for kids too. Can be used indoor and outdoor or during travel. Great addition to our workout room.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable slats improve the ladder's useability.
customer_reviews.text: Like: Light weight, easily unrolled and repacked. A bit shorter than those I'd used in fitness centers. Overall, a good buy. Useful in developing agility skills for trail runs.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: I didn't hate it but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Not as stable as a regular ladder. The fabric straps that keep the rungs together is very hard to get and keep perfectly flat. Have to literally attach it to the floor. I used it for about a month and then swapped it for a higher end more durable model.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder for the money. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Nice ladder for the money. The plastic is a little thin (width wise). Other than that works perfect. I've bought two and happy with both. If I need another one, I would buy it again no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great for cross training
customer_reviews.text: Got this as whole family does functional fitness workouts. As advertised, well laid out, comes with carry bag. Son has also used it for track and running work.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Warm up or Workout
customer_reviews.text: There are some many great cardio exercises you can do just jumping through the rungs of this ladder. Part of my overall fitness plan, this ladder is constructed well and does the job like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Phatmatty

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy but okay for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy, doesn't fold up well or fit back into the bag well. Doesn't lay on the ground well. would be better if the ropes were slightly weighted.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Flip

customer_reviews.title: Great for agility
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product I liked that it is great for running.After you train you will be much better at running.The tough thing for me is that it was a little hard to put it in the bag.You can do it with soccer too.It is a good use of your money. I Loved it it is in good shape
customer_reviews.author: cmescobar

customer_reviews.title: A pain
customer_reviews.text: The rungs on this agility ladder are not fastened in place resulting in having to lay the ladder out and slide all rungs into place every time I use it. I should have sent it back. Currently gluing rungs into place.
customer_reviews.author: Chipvirginia

customer_reviews.title: Cardio Workout
customer_reviews.text: The best footwork cardio workout product for balance, agility and mobility. I highly recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ladder but missing ground pins
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, hence this was my second purchase of exactly same brand and color. But my first purchase also had 4 ground pins to keep the ladder in place, whereas this second purchase had none, making it unsafe and hard to keep in place in park.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for agility
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 8 rung. Works well for my lighter workouts. Probably would recommend getting a longer one for a more effective workout. However, for me, it is a perfect size for working out indoors. Good for a warm-up and focusing on technique
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this product. I ordered this to help my kids work on their footwork for sports. Great quality and best price I can find. This is one of those cases where I got more than I paid for! One thing I didn't notice when I ordered is the snaps at the end of the straps. This allows for me to buy another ladder to extend the length if I ever needed to.
customer_reviews.author: B.Redmon

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cardio workout
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 8 rung and they snap together well,a great visualto get some fast feet cardio in. Greats to encourage kids to workout as well
customer_reviews.author: Josie fonseca

customer_reviews.title: A different, challenging and fun way to do some healthy moving!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for occasional interval training in my home, it should help my fast twitch muscles. I also brought it on vacation and we put it on the lawn and had little competitions with our adult kids, inventing some fancy footwork moves, fun! Would be nice if it came with something to tack it down. It’s not gonna last forever, but I won’t use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Active son who does conditioning all year round. Has wanted one for a while to use when he isn't at practice to work on footwork. He said that it's perfect for what he uses it for.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Ok, with caveat
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. Gets the job done, but the plastic has no weight and no grip so one touch and it moves/ slides. If you can afford it, buy the rubber ladder.
customer_reviews.author: Raphaela R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for garage gym
customer_reviews.text: Very short in length hence you need to do multiple rounds. Also it messes up pretty fast while running. Otherwise good for home workout as I am using it in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for agility training in turf. It works as advertised and had not broken down. Recomend for training
customer_reviews.author: Remberto Salinas

customer_reviews.text: Love this ladder. The plastic is a little flimsy, so not sure how it will wear over time if you ever use it wearing cleats or on hard surfaces. The length is perfect, compact for easy travel, and adjustable to your needs. 10/10 so far
customer_reviews.author: edepp

customer_reviews.title: I love it - Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my elementary age soccer team to learn about and practice about agility. They love it and have lots of fun coming up with patterns to use. Quality is fine for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: E Fink

customer_reviews.title: Nice easy ladder
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor agility training. The carrying case is great for storing it. It does tend to get tangled up, but it is holding up great and we use it often.
customer_reviews.author: M47W

customer_reviews.title: Very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and put away. Stores compact. This was a very affordable tool for children’s agility training without taking up a lot of space. Highly recommend. Shipped fast and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Easy to Store
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our children to help with agility training for football. We can also play games with it. It is so easy to fold up and put away. Very durable!! It’s been through a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to the toolkit
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought. Not because the first was bad but because my team got so much out of it that I wanted to have two. This product is a great addition for any personal trainer or coach.
customer_reviews.author: Carlye Pina

customer_reviews.title: Rungs are just a little slippery
customer_reviews.text: The rungs slide around pretty easily, but excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pete T.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to adjust width, and easy clean up after use. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: KLP

customer_reviews.title: Use for insanity asylum
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for the insanity asylum videos since it was cheaper than the beach body ones. A benefit to this ladder is that it is longer and cheaper price than the beach body ladder. You can make this the same size as the beach body ladder by folding it in half and snapping together the two ends which would also be used to string together multiple ladders for extra lengthy outdoor use. Also comes with carry pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Mope

customer_reviews.title: Fun alternative for a workout.
customer_reviews.text: The ladder is fairly basic, but I like it. Physical therapist had me use this and after I completed the physical therapy, I got this to continue at home. Easy to store and carry to anywhere you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Beasley

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine and does what it states. Why on earth the seller shipped it requiring a signature is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: Dianka

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Agility Ladder
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get. This agility ladder is excellent. It's 7 to 8 feet long and about 15 to 18 in wide.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an exercise ladder!
customer_reviews.text: Good length and the quality seems ok. Not tangled and is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Desmarais

customer_reviews.title: Feet work
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old uses this during her workouts and loves it. Great tool to have in your home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn Review

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Delivery time was fast . Nice exercise ladder But I did not get the paper that was supposed to come with it that showing the different feet movement exercise or I would have give it a 5 start rating .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight. Gets the job down but I probably wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great balance and stepping trainer for any age but for me as an older person with balance problems, too. It helps a lot with coordination, and you can pick your own pace, in the privacy of your home. It does not encourage or cause falling.
customer_reviews.author: A Long-time Prime Person

customer_reviews.title: Not great for mobility impaired training.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for my Parkinson’s Disease participant. But because it doesn’t lie flush with the floor, his special walker wasn’t able to roll over the top and posed a tripping hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Motivation
customer_reviews.text: Yes the kids love this! They use it for their workout!
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie A Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Great for agility athletes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my flag football team, boys ages 11 to 13. Over all this is a very good product, durable, put together well and great for my team. I would like to have seem some tiny tent spikes to peg it down with. Some of my kids have big feet and will get tripped up and tangle the ladder. However over all this ladder was perfect for every player on my team. It increased our agility over 3-4 sessions.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brewington

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I thought this might be one of those things I'd order and then never get around to using - but turns out it is super usable and has great applications for agility training. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Li

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a speed ladder at an affordable price and this is it. Great quality product and I will surely purchase a second one once fall season starts.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for agility training!!! And workouts
customer_reviews.text: My son loves soccer so this item is perfect for his training and also great for workout. We love it as a family we all use it and its a good size item in length!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: travel lite
customer_reviews.text: good buy for the price. perfect for garage gym. With increasing agility, speed and precision take your game to the next level. Recommended by my coach. and it comes with a bag for easy storage and carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Vamshi Challa

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Tool
customer_reviews.text: It works great for quick feet stools, and developing better athleticism with one’s feet. Also, it helps with to develop coordination of the body and legs. The bag it comes in is also very useful to store it in, especially if the buyer keeps the rubber bands and Velcro strap that come with the ladder, which help keep the ladder together.
customer_reviews.author: Matthias

customer_reviews.title: 4stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for training on your speed. Definitely great for people who do sports, or workout at home.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well spaced
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to use. Perfect length for indoor use. Lays flat and spaces well.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Great ladder!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!. Great workout ladder no problems very sturdy!. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: deisi s.

product_meta.title: Yes4All Agility Ladder – Speed Agility Training Ladder with Carry Bag
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY LADDER: Constructed of nylon speed ladder with durable plastic rungs for agility and quickness training
FULLY ADJUSTABLE 8, 12 AND 20 RUNG DESIGN: Up to 15-inch adjustment from rung to rung with nylon straps for different levels, skill sets and exercises. Suitable to meet all your workout demands

INCLUDE A CARRY BAG: You can easily stash them in the carry bag to train anytime and anywhere that you want. Great for active kids, athletes, and beneficial for older adults to workout, maintain balance and mobility

BETTER ATHLETIC PERFORMANCE: Ideal for athletic training, football, soccer, basketball drills, hockey, lacrosse, tennis, badminton, rugby to increase acceleration, leg strength, and speed, core skills, balance, rhythm, and body control

1 YEAR WARR - PLACE YOUR ORDER NOW: Make your special ideal gifts for sport teams or coaches. Our speed ladder stands up to 1 YEAR warr or if you think it’s not for you, contact us and receive all your money back within 30 days of purchase
